page.title: 15LIFESTYLES 1
page.content: {New to Kenton { }Its only my second day in Kenton and my first morning at school. My first impression of Kenton was a quiet village,I think I was right. At first I didnt like the idea of going to a small school now I think its nice. I think the people here are friendly. The fourth year girls have been kind to me. I prefer Kenton from Shrewsbury because its quieter and it has nicer surroundings. I prefer my house at Kenton because its bigger and more modern than my other house. I like the way you can walk into the country at any time. We moved to Devon because of my Dads job. He works in a bank in Exeter. Im looking forward to being able to go to the sea because its so close. Before we had to go to Wales to get to the seaside.
